languages.text: {n}Фелек слегка касается закрытого ока на лбу.{/n} "Благодаря особому гену навигаторы более устойчивы к варпу, чем простые смертные. Именно поэтому мы способны направлять корабли сквозь {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Океан Душ{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Фелек слегка касается закрытого ока на лбу.{/n} "Благодаря особому гену Навигаторы более устойчивы к варпу, чем простые смертные. Именно поэтому мы способны направлять корабли сквозь {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Океан Душ{/g}".

languages.text: {n}Felek gently touches the closed eye on his forehead.{/n} "Thanks to a special gene, Navigators are more resistant to the emanations of the warp than mere mortals. This is what allows us to guide ships through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Фелек слегка касается закрытого ока на лбу.{/n} "Благодаря особому гену навигаторы более устойчивы к варпу, чем простые смертные. Именно поэтому мы способны направлять корабли сквозь {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Океан Душ{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Felek gently touches the closed eye in his forehead.{/n} "Thanks to a special gene, the Navigators are more resistant to the emanations of the warp than mere mortals. This is what allows us to guide ships through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Ocean of Souls{/g}."

{n}Felek gently touches the closed eye in his forehead.{/n} "Thanks to a special gene, the Navigators are more resistant to the emanations of the warp than mere mortals. This is what allows us to guide ships through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Ocean of Souls{/g}."

{n}Felek gently touches the closed eye on his forehead.{/n} "Thanks to a special gene, Navigators are more resistant to the emanations of the warp than mere mortals. This is what allows us to guide ships through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

{n}Felek gently touches the closed eye on his forehead.{/n} "Thanks to a special gene, Navigators are more resistant to the emanations of the warp than mere mortals. This is what allows us to guide ships through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

{n}Felek gently touches the closed eye on his forehead.{/n} "Thanks to a special gene, Navigators are more resistant to the emanations of the warp than mere mortals. This is what allows us to guide ships through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

languages.text: {n}Felek acaricia delicadamente el ojo cerrado de su frente.{/n} «Gracias a un gen especial que poseemos los navegantes, somos más resistentes a las emisiones de la disformidad que los simples mortales. Es esta habilidad la que nos permite atravesar el {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Mar de Almas{/g} con nuestras naves».
languages.original_text: {n}Felek gently touches the closed eye on his forehead.{/n} "Thanks to a special gene, Navigators are more resistant to the emanations of the warp than mere mortals. This is what allows us to guide ships through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Felek acaricia delicadamente el ojo cerrado de su frente.{/n} «Gracias a un gen especial que poseemos los navegantes, somos más resistentes a las emisiones de la disformidad que los simples mortales. Es esta habilidad la que nos permite atravesar el {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}mar de almas{/g} con nuestras naves».

languages.text: {n}Felek berührt sanft das geschlossene Auge auf seiner Stirn.{/n} "Dank eines speziellen Gens sind Navigatoren den Ausströmungen des Warps gegenüber besser gefreit als bloße Sterbliche. Das gestattet es uns, Schiffe durch das {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Meer der Seelen{/g} zu führen."
languages.original_text: {n}Felek gently touches the closed eye on his forehead.{/n} "Thanks to a special gene, Navigators are more resistant to the emanations of the warp than mere mortals. This is what allows us to guide ships through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Felek berührt sanft das geschlossene Auge auf seiner Stirn.{/n} "Dank eines speziellen Gens sind Navigatoren den Ausströmungen des Warps gegenüber besser gefreit als bloße Sterbliche. Das gestattet es uns, Schiffe durch das {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Meer der Seelen{/g} zu führen."

languages.text: {n}Du bout du doigt, Felek effleure l'œil fermé sur son front.{/n} « Grâce à un gène spécial, les navigateurs résistent mieux que de simples mortels aux émanations du Warp. C'est ce qui nous permet de guider les vaisseaux dans la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Mer des Âmes{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Felek gently touches the closed eye on his forehead.{/n} "Thanks to a special gene, Navigators are more resistant to the emanations of the warp than mere mortals. This is what allows us to guide ships through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du bout du doigt, Felek effleure l'œil fermé sur son front.{/n} « Grâce à un gène spécial, les navigateurs résistent mieux que de simples mortels aux émanations du Warp. C'est ce qui nous permet de guider les vaisseaux dans la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Mer des Âmes{/g}. »

languages.text: {n}费雷克轻轻地触摸着额头上紧闭的眼睛。{/n}“由于某种特殊基因的影响，我们导航者比凡人更能抵抗亚空间的影响。正因如此，我们才能引导飞船穿越{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}灵魂之海{/g}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Felek gently touches the closed eye on his forehead.{/n} "Thanks to a special gene, Navigators are more resistant to the emanations of the warp than mere mortals. This is what allows us to guide ships through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}费雷克轻轻地触摸着额头上紧闭的眼睛。{/n}“由于某种特殊基因的影响，我们导航者比凡人更能抵抗亚空间的影响。正因如此，我们才能引导飞船穿越{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}灵魂之海{/g}。”

languages.text: {n}フェレックは額の閉じた目にそっと触れた。{/n}「特別な遺伝子のおかげで、航宙士はそこらへんの者達よりも<歪み>の空気に耐性がある。そのおかげで、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}魂の海{/g}を通って船を導けるのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Felek gently touches the closed eye on his forehead.{/n} "Thanks to a special gene, Navigators are more resistant to the emanations of the warp than mere mortals. This is what allows us to guide ships through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}フェレックは額の閉じた目にそっと触れた。{/n}「特別な遺伝子のおかげで、航宙士はそこらへんの者達よりも<歪み>の空気に耐性がある。そのおかげで、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}魂の海{/g}を通って船を導けるのだ」
{n}フェレックは額の閉じた目にそっと触れた。{/n}「特別な遺伝子のおかげで、航宙士はそこらへんの者達よりも<歪み>の空気に耐性がある。そのおかげで、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}魂の海{/g}を通って船を導けるのだ」

languages.text: {n}Felek, alnındaki kapalı göze hafifçe dokunuyor.{/n} "Rotacılar, özel bir gen sağ olsun, sıradan fânilere kıyasla öteboyut tezahürüne daha dirençlidir. Gemileri de {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Ruhlar Denizi'nden{/g} bu sayede geçiriyoruz."
languages.original_text: {n}Felek gently touches the closed eye on his forehead.{/n} "Thanks to a special gene, Navigators are more resistant to the emanations of the warp than mere mortals. This is what allows us to guide ships through the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Sea of Souls{/g}."
